content: experience the beauty of puff stitches with the moorland puff scarf pattern this scarf delivers a wonderfully soft and warm texture perfect for a cozy stylish accessory keep an eye out for the matching hat pattern being released next week **grab your free scarf pattern from my website or purchase the ad-free pdf right here on ravelry ** a photo tutorial is included in the post and in the pdf version next week s matching hat pattern uses the same yarn this is just one of the patterns included in our may scarf of the month club collection join the cal newsletter here https
